title: The Aussie Greeting
description: Say 'G'day mate!' to the next 3 people you meet today

title: Vegemite Challenge
description: Eat a spoonful of Vegemite and post your reaction

title: Thong Throw
description: Play a game of thong (flip-flop) throwing with your mates

title: Fair Dinkum
description: Speak in Australian slang for the next hour

title: BBQ Master
description: Cook something on the barbie and share it with a neighbor

title: Wake-Up Call
description: Call or message me at a set time tomorrow to make sure I wake up on time.

title: Surprise Snack
description: Buy me a snack that you think I’ll love.

title: The DJ
description: You must let me control the music for the next hour, no complaints.

title: Power Hour
description: You have one hour to complete any task I give you.

title: Social Sabotage
description: Post a funny (but not too embarrassing) status or story on your social media.

title: Coffee Run
description: Bring me my favorite coffee or tea.

title: Cheers to That
description: Take a shot or drink of my choice with me right now.

title: Clean Freak
description: Tidy up a room or space I choose.

title: The Chauffeur
description: Drive me somewhere, no matter how inconvenient.

title: Mystery Gift
description: Buy me a small surprise gift.

title: Shoutout
description: Compliment me publicly in person or on social media.

title: Flashback
description: Share a funny or embarrassing memory about us.

title: Freestyle
description: Perform a 30-second rap or poem about me.

title: Disloyalty
description: Convince a colleague you prefer a competitors product.

title: Sing It
description: Perform a song of my choice (or at least the chorus) out loud.

title: Truth Bomb
description: Answer one personal question honestly.

title: Dare Me
description: I get to dare you to do something within reason.

title: Fast Food Run
description: Go get food from a drive-thru of my choice.

title: Gamer Mode
description: Play a video or board game of my choice with me.

title: The Joker
description: Tell me your best joke. If I don’t laugh, you owe me a favor.

title: The Decision Maker
description: You have to make a tough decision for me.

title: Good Vibes Only
description: You have to hype me up and say five great things about me.

title: Photo Op
description: Take a fun or ridiculous picture with me right now.

title: Blindfold Challenge
description: Try to complete a simple task blindfolded.

title: Instant Party
description: You must play music and dance for at least 30 seconds.

title: Movie Night
description: Watch a movie of my choice with me.

title: Mystery Task
description: I get to make up a brand-new challenge for you.

title: Secret Keeper
description: Tell me something you’ve never told me before.

title: Random Act of Kindness
description: Do something nice for a stranger.

title: Insta Poll
description: Let me create and post a poll on your social media.

title: Story Time
description: Tell me a funny or embarrassing story from your past.

title: Gourmet Chef
description: Make me a fancy sandwich with whatever ingredients you have.

title: Wild Card
description: This can be ANY challenge from the list, or a brand-new one of my choice!

title: Coffee Challenge
description: Order your coffee in your worst accent

title: Dance Move
description: Do your best robot dance in a public place

title: Aussie Anthem
description: Sing 'Waltzing Matilda' at your next meeting

title: Food Adventure
description: Try Vegemite on your next three meals

title: Random Act
description: Pay for a stranger's coffee

title: Active Challenge
description: Do 10 kangaroo hops at your desk

title: Photo Fun
description: Take a selfie with a random dog (ask owner's permission)

title: Creative Writing
description: Write a haiku about Australian wildlife

title: Meeting Fun
description: Use 'fair dinkum' in your next work meeting

title: Food Share
description: Share your lunch with a colleague

title: Active Break
description: Take a 10-minute walk during lunch

title: Art Challenge
description: Draw a kangaroo and share it with the team

title: Aussie Slang
description: Use 'mate' in every conversation today

title: Food Explorer
description: Try a new local cafe you've never been to

title: Kind Message
description: Send a thank you note to someone who helped you

title: Team Spirit
description: Bring in homemade treats for your team

title: Pet Portrait
description: Take a fancy portrait photo of your pet (or a friend's pet)

title: Pet Talk
description: Have a full conversation with a pet using only animal noises

title: Pet Fashion
description: Dress up your pet (or stuffed animal) in your clothes

title: Pet Names
description: Only refer to people by pet names (puppy, kitty, etc.) for the next hour

title: Pet Stories
description: Tell your best pet story to three different people today

title: Pet Dance
description: Make up and perform a dance routine with your pet

title: Quick Plank
description: Hold a plank position for 30 seconds during your next break

title: Stair Master
description: Take the stairs instead of the elevator for the whole day

title: Desk Squats
description: Do 10 squats every time you check your phone

title: Water Warrior
description: Drink a glass of water and do 5 jumping jacks each hour

title: Mindful Minute
description: Take a minute to focus on your breathing and clear your mind

title: Gratitude Break
description: Write down three things you're grateful for right now

title: Nature Connect
description: Take a 5-minute walk outside and notice 3 beautiful things

title: Digital Detox
description: Turn off all notifications for the next hour

title: Stretch Break
description: Do 3 different stretches for 30 seconds each

title: Mindful Tea
description: Make a cup of tea and drink it without any distractions

title: Box Breathing
description: Do 4 rounds of box breathing: inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s
